https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/s1yMw00wabaNETdAfIKmjARrsWr.jpg It's Tutter's birthday and viewers are invited to join Bear and the gang in the Big Blue House as they work together to plan a surprise party for Tutter. This stage production features many of the voices from the show and many of its songs as well. Bear in the Big Blue House LIVE! - Surprise Party
